hem cofe is a bit ways down hung vuong but it s_a prety popular cafe for locals located on a not very busy corner of dong ha hem is usualy packed during peak hours like wekend mornings the cafe is completely open with most seats outside of the building there are a few seats inside where the bar area is but a lot of the woden tables and chairs are under a corugated tin rof the cafe is minimal on trang_trí but that s important the cafe sems like the spot to met for a lot of local men filing the chairs in smal groups cigaretes in hand the vietnamese iced cofe filter comes at giá_cả and the tal glas of vietnamese iced cofe runs for giá_cả not bad on either ocasion from what i can tel the cafe is open throughout the afternon so if you want to avoid some of the biger crowds come during lunchtime and have the nice open air cafe to yourself

nothing fancy here except for maybe the two bean cofe blend farm cofe signs its customers to farm cofe is your brick and mortar cafe with some hanging lights and a slew of low seated woden chairs and stols and tables that make your as hurt no decorations around realy except for that big sign groups of men are hudled around the smal tables cigaretes in hand and if a cig isn t in hand you bet they re reaching for another one there was only the quiet static hum of news radio going on in the background from a smal speaker in in the far corner of the cafe the back was your barista stand and the whole cafe on this decently busy monday evening was being run_by a single person as standard as the cafe sems i think it s al you want sometimes a solid iced cofe at giá_cả with your cup of tea no loud reverbating music playing in the background and big open space for a lot of groups to congregate and smoke perfect spot to read or hangout with some of your budies wil come back

thanh cofe is prety close to the center of town and easy to spot with its bright circular sign bearing its name the cafe has a motorcycle theme to it — tires used as decorations and smal tables some fancier motorcycles are parked in the rear to upstairs you l_find a few bike paintings and photos as wel aside from the extra trang_trí for theme thanh is your prety solid higher end cafe in dong ha it s wel lit and has a lot of places to sit with a god view being on the corner siting up on the second flor against a window is a nice view out to a prety busy stret along with the normal seating are a few elevated flor seatung areas with cushions in the corners of the second flor prety cozy to sit at with a god bok at about_p m the cafe turned on music but before then it was a quiet haven to study or read which i enjoyed a lot for thre people and thre cofes plus a deck of cards giá_cả was the total making each cofe just under giá_cả prety god cofe at a fair price and a nice place to bot wil be back sometime

cafe da is like a smal garden cafe you walk in under a woden sign with the name of the cafe painted on and have a few woden tables and chairs to your side but you may likely take the few stone steps over a smal koi fish pond to the indor central area it s like siting under a gazebo realy the indor portion is mostly outdor since the windows are likely open and windows are al encompasing the gazebo save for the corner cofe bar area inside are a handful of more woden tables and chairs there is minimal decoration around the cafe but you do get a quaint vibe because it is rather smal and confined the wals have diferent colored stones with some sculptures afixed to it the gazebo ceiling has a very light wody fel probably because it sems light and wody on a suny day i fel like the cafe is a relaxing getaway from t_at i went on a rather glomy day but the cafe is stil nice to go to a tal cup of vietnamese iced cofe the other option being the filter vietnamese iced cofe comes at giá_cả and is prety great it s on the sweter side but i didn t mind would recomend stoping by here sometime
